The photos were published on Facebook on: 2019, and have been shared over 1,000 times.
The Indonesian: language caption of the post translates to English as "May our brothers and sisters are safe, an accident of a ferry from Makassar to Selayar that sank at 2 pm today."
Reverse image searches on Google reveal: 4. The photos match handout pictures from the Indonesian Disaster Mitigation Agency, which were published on AFP's website on July 3, 2018.
